results.definition: put forward; nominate for appointment to an office or for an honor or position

examples: she proposed marriage to the man she had known for only two months

results.definition: make a proposal, declare a plan for something
examples: the senator proposed to abolish the sales tax

results.definition: present for consideration, examination, criticism, etc.
examples: He proposed a new plan for dealing with terrorism
She proposed a new theory of relativity
